snippet: At Malcolm A. Smith’s bribery and wire fraud trial, jurors hear recordings of the state senator and others discussing incentives to support his mayoral campaign.
abstract: Testimony in corruption trial of New York State Sen Malcolm A Smith reveals conversation between Smith and two men who were working surreptitiously for federal authorities about supporting his New York City mayoral campaign; important for its revelations about New York State politics, conversation also reveals an 'American Hustle'-style seduction by government informers to see how far Smith would go to secure the nomination.
lead_paragraph: At Malcolm A. Smith’s bribery and wire fraud trial, jurors hear recordings of the state senator and others discussing incentives to support his mayoral campaign.

headline.seo: Talking of Incentives as Malcolm A. Smith Sought Rise
headline.main: Tapes in State Senator’s Trial Reveal Quid Pro Quo Arrangements
headline.print_headline: Tapes Reveal Quid Pro Quo Arrangements
